lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Dungeons and Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like that. Durr and Durr.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How der der der der.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. So. Before we jump into the story for this evening, let's go ahead and get through our announcements. First and foremost, we have a fantastic sponsor for tonight's episode. Backblaze has returned to us. Good friends to the show, and Sam, you wanted to talk a little bit about this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I right? Usually, when you back up your data, you look like this guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: C drive? USB port? HTTP? Forward slash? Ugh! Speak English! All these wires and cables! I can't take it anymore!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But now there's Backblaze, a cloud-based backup system that's so easy, you'll look like this gal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so easy, even a total jackass could use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, Marisha, even a total jackass can use it, and I'm living proof. Taliesin, Backblaze backs up photos, documents, fanfic, and all your user data, and here's the best part. How much do you think it costs?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a system like that? It's got to cost, what? $200, maybe? $300 a month?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds too low. I'm going to guess $9,000 a month.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Keep guessing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: $100,000 a month!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not even close. If you order now, you'll get Backblaze for just five dollars a month for unlimited and unfryable backup.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Five dollars? That's nothing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I literally burn five-dollar bills to stay warm on chilly nights.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, me too. Oh, I'm so convinced. But Sam, how do I sign up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's simple, Marish. Go to backblaze.com/criticalrole and you'll get a two-week free trial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was that URL again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: backblaze.com/criticalrole!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: backblaze.com/criticalrole!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One more time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: backblaze.com/criticalrole! There's no end. I didn't write an end to the bit. That's it. It's over. Yay! And scene.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm caught in wires. There we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, any merch news?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got these amazing Vox Machina t-shirts in the store.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is someone wearing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yev is wearing it, from Backblaze. But nobody here is, but they're so soft and they're amazing. We also have hoodies and hats and patches and nail wraps and stickers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you guys want to thank the awesome Melissa Kelp for her design, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Who designed Vox Machina, and that was in our original fan contest that we did. We had that awesome design that was so cool that we decided to make that design, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Melissa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Melissa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) Amazing job!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Wednesday Club, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There might be a teenage witch. Maybe a band. I don't know. We'll see. It's not official yet, but I'm working on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elrond of Riverdale. Thank you very much, Taliesin. Marisha, Signal Boost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) You got your Geek and Sundry in my Nerdist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got your Nerdist in my Geek and Sundry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You dick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so disgusting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking dick!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, this got dark really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That and more you can look forward to at MomoCon, as me, Marisha, and Taliesin will be there in a couple weeks in Atlanta, Georgia. So we'll see you guys there May 25th to 28th, and I will be a guest at A-Kon June 8th-11th in Fort Worth, Texas. For all you folks out there in the Texas area, come say hi, that'll be fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) Fort Worth, Texas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) I went to college there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should come to your college.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (muffled) No, I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They accepted and went on their way, and with that, we begin today's episode. So you guys have been traveling down the side of the mountain, of the Alabaster Sierras, returning late-night to the city of Whitestone. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, can I cast Locate Object and try to find that diamond that he chucked over the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on Locate Object?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it a thousand-foot cliff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was far down there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I've probably got about 30 or 40 minutes left on the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could fly down. Some of us own flying brooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can fly down on flying brooms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do that. Yeah? I can go swimming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, I don't have my thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That says what the distance on Locate Object is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The distance is 1,000 feet of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so can I get on my broom and cast it and go try to find it down in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. It lasts for ten minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm organizing my dice right now! 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Okay. It takes you the better part of the next ten minutes or so to even get a blip on your arcane radar. And you suddenly sense as you're coasting along the very base of the surf where the waters crash against the rocks, the tide has been coming in with the full moon, and you can see now the water itself is rough and just smashing into the side of the cliff base. You get a small glimmer, a small beacon, a draw to you like a small pulling under the waves. And you sense about maybe 65 feet down, there it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 65 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Under the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Under the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's three diving tanks for competitive diving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So probably couldn't do it unless I have breathing underwater?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or your friend Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's up top. Would I remember the spot in the fucking water if I went up and got her and brought her back down? Do I have enough time to do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try and remember it and come back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we within earpiece-shot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with her right now. You'd have to go back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I fly straight up from the spot so I don't lose it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're pretty much on the cusp of it. You've been a little flexible on the range of them, but we'll say you get a little ways up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, Keyleth! Can you swim?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (chuckles) Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you come help me get this diamond back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I on the cliff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on top of the cliff, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can come-- Oh. Are you really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really high drop!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do the Pocahontas swan dive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I run and cliff dive!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Jesus. Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) Sail!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings) Sail! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you gently leap off, and as you're falling you can see you probably have, I'd say about 300 feet or so before you're going to hit rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hit rock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cliff is not perfectly vertical. It's a little bit angled and you're heading down to hit the rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go, oops! And can I do a Gust against the cliff wall to push me back a little bit further?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom check. This is a straight wisdom modifier check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good! Just straight wisdom modifier? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Like a gentle fart, you push yourself a little ways from the cliff. I'll say it does just enough of a shove where the trajectory changes slightly. You may or may not be right where the rock hits the surf. You can test it or not. It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Test it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this was the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiki, don't kill yourself over this rock!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was nice being in a couple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At the last minute, I'm going to (panicked squealing). And turn into a goldfish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before you hit the water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the rock?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm assuming the goldfish would make it easier to hit water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you're going to hit rock!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goldfish are not magnetically attracted to water. They still just fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about flying fish or something, so you can maybe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think flying fish actually fly, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but they got big fins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They do glide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Regardless, as you turn into a goldfish, rocketing towards the base of the water...

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's taking a picture of it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would just pop back to myself. I wouldn't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then any additional damage would go over into your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's too many dice to roll, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's fine! We're gods!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we? She says as she dies on the rocks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you even tempt that shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why am I drinking your coffee? I'm going to stop right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. What is he doing? No. Seriously, though. What if she just died?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be kind of amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took 363 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are lying. You are lying! By hitting rocks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By hitting rocks at terminal velocity. It's 1d6 per ten feet falling. Keyleth scatters across the edge of the rock. And just crumples into the surf and is now floating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! What? You are lying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! You just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean? That's below her total hit points!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's instant death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's dead. Keyleth is dead and floating in the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unrevivable death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably revivable. You've just got to retrieve the body.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! Vex! I gave you a coin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A Revivify coin!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! I thought you were trying to make it out like I'd still hit water!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I said the distance you jumped and then pushed--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totally logical! You can't even see the water or rocks, but you're like, yep! I've got this, bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am having the best conversation with JB right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the best thing that's ever happened!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but here's the thing, do I have to roll if I use the coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now, officially, every member of Vox Machina has died. Most in battle, or some danger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That took care of it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You broke the seal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Was I supposed to turn into a flying creature? And be safe from this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you! That's literally your choice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I am starting to sweat! Who sees it? I don't see it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only person that sees it is Vex. Vex, you watch as Keyleth-- (jump, poof, splat). It's a scatter of red mess. And you see her floating in the water.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's only 7:15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! This was not in my plan!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Go get her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go fly down there! Is she a body, at least?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because she hit as the goldfish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and the goldfish which has a hit point.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which then made the other 324 hit points go over to Marisha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the goldfish turned into orange marmalade?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was like a magic trick! It was like a fish turned into a corpse!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I use my coin that Tary gave me? My coin of Revivify on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you gave it to her before the battle, right? Yes, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I do that. Don't touch my dice in anger!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not angry!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. How do I do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a straight wisdom check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A wisdom check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yells) I'm so nervous!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stop laughing, Travis! Stop it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, you can't feel bad about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I was going to hit water and it would be cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay. As you go down and pull her out of the water, her soaked red hair covers her face, and that's probably a good thing. As you're a little scared to see--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a red-haired The Ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the shit is this show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know! This was not in the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (screaming) That was higher than I thought!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, by the way, looks wrecked. She's still scratched everywhere, she's covered in blood, but she's alive at one hit point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiki, that was really, really stupid. I put my hands on both sides of her face and cast Cure Wounds at 4th level. Oh, no! At 3rd level, because I used Grasping Vine last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 3rd level. Okay. So 3d8 plus your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Good. Just a little drop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a beautiful D&D moment, right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is sitting with JB right now, going like, so what was Pike like when she was really little, little for a gnome?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all were wearing the necklace, so we all got a beep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, briefly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was really paying attention to JB, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is yours broken? I think mine's broken!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I felt something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I might have been blowing off some steam. And I'm really sorry! (crying) I thought it was going to be fine! I didn't know there was going to be rocks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe next time you're diving off a cliff, turn into a bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It might have been a last-minute panic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad you're back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, that was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? Let's not even worry about that coin there. I mean the diamond. I feel like, maybe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could go get it now! It's fine. I'm here now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel really bad, because-- I feel bad about that. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think maybe this is a lesson learned in what is worth risking our lives for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a cloud of red in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was, but the waves are crashing pretty heavy. Luckily, Vex grabbed her immediately, because otherwise her body would have been thrown under the rocks again by the surf. I just explained the ocean to you before you jumped! That's what would have happened!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A thousand feet was all you needed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have some amazing physics books that we will actually get into at some point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry about flying right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can go get the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just going up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still have a Beast Shape left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just going to go up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're leaving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's covered in gore, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, she's covered in blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Price paid, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys are talking to JB, who's still stunned by the whole thing-- all of this happened pretty quickly, so she's not necessarily opening up entirely, but she's like, "Well. You "know, we were both troublemakers."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Because she's got a wild streak. Now, does that run in the family, or is that just her and you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that definitely runs in the family." She looks over to you Pike, again, and is like, "I am so sorry. I didn't--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll try and make it up to you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just know I don't want you to-- if you don't want to stay here, you don't have to stay here. I'm not holding you here against your will in any way, but I would love for you to stay because I would love to get to know you better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How could I say no? (chuckles) I'll stay until you need me to leave."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, you watch as Vex and Keyleth and the broom come up and land on the cliffside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you two found that diamond-- oh, sweet Pelor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? We're not going to worry about the diamond right now. Yeah, let's just maybe take a moment and recover from that battle which was so hard on everyone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? You-- What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's fine. She's fine!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's more blood than person.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we need to fix anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, Pike. If you can do a little--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! Cure Wounds!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I used your coin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm glad I gave it to you, then. Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine. I can go back and get that diamond now. I feel really bad right now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think somebody's got a carpet ride down the hill coming to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm casting Lay on Hands for my piddly 20 hit points. What did you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it'd be fun. I haven't had a lot of fun here lately, okay? It felt like the old days of when Vox Machina was back together, because we've been away for a while.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You just dove off, Free Willy-nilly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you were in the clear, as well. All I saw was Keyleth and then this little tiny fleck of gold and then gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, did you miss? Did you hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you die?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She looks like a fucking macabre mess! What happened?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot that that's what that was. I felt a (whirring), you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been a lot of responsibility here lately, and a lot of being an adult and so I was like: Vox! We're reckless!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what alcohol is for! Don't jump off cliffs anymore, please!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you fucked up. That was crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to confess, I've been feeling a bit stir-crazy myself. Not jump-off-cliffs stir-crazy, dear god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I turn her bloody face to you and say, let this be a lesson to you, then!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just saying that I understand the impulse. This was not necessarily the best expression of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go on a hunt. That's what we need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think let's take a nap and then maybe go out--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start kissing the gory mess in my hands all over her forehead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's gross. Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty gross. You marked off the 300 gold for the Revivify, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Revivify. It consumes a diamond worth 300 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, did that hurt? Did it hurt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It felt like blackness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blackness?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It felt like a lot of adrenaline. And it was super exciting and then next thing I knew, everyone was super concerned about my well-being.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you addicted to death now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we healed her up a bit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to heal her up a little more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do a healing draught for her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Healing draught.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you guys know: hitting water and rocks from very high feels like hitting rocks!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I literally have books on the subject.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, as you turn around, you watch as Tary is handing you this small glass vial of what looks to be-- what color liquid is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's colorless and odorless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it's like a thicker water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just drink it. It'll make you feel better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just dove off a cliff, so fuck it at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much does she heal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled on my iPhone. 37. It's 8d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you heal 37 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh Jesus, 37?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do yours, too!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! I'll do a Cure Wounds. I haven't used any spells. Let's do 5th level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 5th level? Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm fine! Don't worry about me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are you at now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good! 104.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all go home, have a drink, and discuss this over a drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why? What? Why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I think this may speak to a larger issue amongst us that maybe you are the canary in the coal mine, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard "We're gods!" before she hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was it "I'm a golden god?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said: I'm a golden god! But you know what? I'm still alive; I wasn't entirely wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not still alive, you're alive again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should celebrate because we've broken in the entire group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, I think everybody has at least been dead for a moment at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was I dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look how much red is all over you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be aware of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could make another Kiki out of what you're wearing right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I die? I think I died. In the water, I think I died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He died at the palace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Think I died.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you looking at me like that?! Don't look at me like that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not looking at you like anything. You need a bath, is what you need.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're covered in shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really a lot right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say we go back. I would love to go back and maybe have lots of drinks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: JB. Welcome to the family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A different path than the other Trickfoots were taking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we need a hobby?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll never beat that death.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's like Keyleth-falling-in-lava bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, how many fail compilation videos have you seen where people jump off the cliff and hit just at the bottom. That was what you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) It was totally a fail video!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were in a huge fight with a fake thing that did no damage and you killed yourself in four seconds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're gods! (vomit sound) Unreal. Couldn't write it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought I could make it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 51 to 100, she hits the rock. 94.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I hit the rock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Either way, you were really screwed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, a goldfish, even at that velocity-- although the velocity would have lessened it more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I should have bailed out as a bird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make-believe has consequences.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over the course of the next day or little over a day, you camp once in the Parchwood and make your way back to Whitestone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is 15 hours of that therapy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For you, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love how out of everything we've seen, what I just did was apparently the most fucked up. Out of everything that's happened to us, and now we need therapy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were living Tolkien and now we've suddenly shifted into Game of Thrones. It got very dark, very random, very quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gods. Dead. Five Seconds. Hard to beat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all stand for something. What do you fall for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find your way back to Whitestone. You check in. The guards are happy to see that you've returned fine. They report to you that the Trickfoot clan have not returned and have not been seen near the city since your return. There are few questions as to where they went.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have their vehicle searched for anything that doesn't belong to them, and then made ready for them outside the city bounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, sir." And they search through it and mostly what's found in there are maybe 102 gold pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have anybody with a criminal background search the vehicle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are a number of people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like someone extremely sketchy to search. Actually, Vax, would you search the vehicle?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And JB, if there is anything you need out of there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have chocolate on your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB wipes it with a thumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including anything that you think would be in more capable hands if they were in your hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a small tattered book and she puts it to her side. "That's all. I don't care about the rest."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, quick check to see if there's anything we care about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, so good. Investigation, yeah? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get the sense that anything of importance was on their persons. They weren't really storing a lot of things in an open cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This has been a bad couple of days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, just wanted to make sure there wasn't anything (sighs) complicated. Leave the gold, obviously, and the food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, Doty's like, "Tary."

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to learn humor, Doty. Sarcasm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so. What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the time you've returned, it's probably late afternoon. We'll say at this point because it's been about a little over a day and a half at this point, so, yeah. Mid-afternoon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What should we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go check on the Slayer's Cake?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we should probably do that. It's been a couple of days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did we do with it while we were gone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we have someone running it? Do we have someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a sign that says "Closed for adventuring."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. We should hire someone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We really should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To run it if we're not around. (gasps) JB!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the thief. That's a good idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's a great idea!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, do you like baking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't really tried."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you any management experience?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I took care of Uncle Ogden."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would you even be interested in maybe running a bakery? Or is that something that just sounds like the most dreadful thing in the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (nervous laugh) "I don't know." And she pulls her hair. "I could try."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you at math?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm quite good at math, actually."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous. Let's head there and see how you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Let's see, but not make any promises, because someone who's never run any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, Tary, you would know about hiring people far more than--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should have a proper interview.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check references.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you weren't a proper adventurer until you were. Got to start somewhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True, but I had the advantage of being able to buy my way in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, but you were still pretty shitty at it, when we first started.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a form of nepotism. It's pretty reasonable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm open to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is everyone going to the Slayer's Cake?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because we can eat, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Right, you guys all make your way to the Slayer's Cake, as the afternoon is coming to a close, dusk is starting to change the colors of the sky. Clouds are beginning to move in, as the night's evening air grows colder. As you come to the outside, you see, it's dark and closed, and you see what appears to be a figure sitting on the ground against the wall, back to the wall, knees huddled up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not JB?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, JB is walking with you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In front of the bakery?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the door, a little bit adjacent to where the door is closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't recognize them. Can we see their face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this the same day, or has it been a day now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah! You see actually, a woman in her late thirties or so, early forties, platinum-blonde hair, that's pulled up in a ratty bun. She's got strands hanging in the front of her face, that go to about just past her chin. She has a very simple dress, and a somewhat dirty apron, and a small satchel on her side, and she's leaning against the wall, her knees clutched to her, she's looking forward, she hasn't noticed you guys yet; you're a little ways up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I don't recognize her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not recognize her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Excuse me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh!" And she gets up, and stands up, and (grunting) her back creaks a little bit, and she stretches it, and dusts off the front of her apron, you see little bit of dust (poof). "I'm "terribly sorry, I wasn't sure when you were going to be coming back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, no. We were just off on an adventure, but it'll take a little while before the food is ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that. (sighs) If you have a moment? Fine sirs and madams, I'm sorry to bother you, you "see, my husband Dathen has not returned from sea in about six months. And I'm not certain if he's "coming back, and I'm without work and coffers he left me have come empty this month, so could you "perhaps use a hand here at the bakery?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Timing is quite--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was ridiculous timing, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Madam, what's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hilda."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you would like a job at our bakery?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If at all possible."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you bake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do!" She reaches into her satchel and you see in the inside she has a bunch of these small things wrapped in paper, and she opens one and pulls it out and shows it to you. You see it's this tiny little cream puff. It's perfectly made, and has a little icing on the top. She's like, "I used to just make these for old Dathen, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May we try it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course!" She goes and pulls a handful out and hands them amongst you and gives them over.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is a beautiful cream puff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really hard to make.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick sidebar. This is better than anything we've ever made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you already eat it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It was really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to wait a few minutes to see if Tary looks like he just falls over or anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. What? You think it's poisoned?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm sure it's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ate it. I ate the whole thing in one bite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was really good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I going to die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give me all your stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often do you just eat strangers' cream puffs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes go wide and like (mumbles).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I going to die? Did you just kill me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she didn't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually very good. It's very, very good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're right, that is fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if it's all the same, I may have another prospect for JB anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, come on inside, Hilda. Let's show you around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, all right."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is delicious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is better than anything that we make.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can't possibly be that good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Have you tried any of our baked goods, yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't. I've seen it from a distance, but I couldn't really afford to. I'd like to."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you live here in Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do. I live right behind--" And she points up to the left. Like if the Sun Tree is in the center and you head up straight on the eastern side-- sorry, the western side of the square, the path that leads up towards Whitestone Castle, she points about two blocks up and on the left. And there's a small hovel that's pushed between two buildings there. And she goes, "That's where I stay."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight check her? Because I don't trust anybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't trust anybody!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just makes us seem like assholes, because we're like (grumbles). I want to go in a little bit and ask around and see what people think of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? A background check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A little background check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whispers.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I get a whisper?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you never had a whisper?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think on the show I've had a whisper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: backblaze.com/criticalrole to get two weeks free or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, two weeks. Oh, you want to do the infomercial bit again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really do, but you guys did such an amazing job, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is why we're the cool table.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bake her into the pies.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have references?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "References?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you worked anywhere else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I've mostly just been a housewife, until recently."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have anyone in the community who could vouch for your character and trustworthiness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. Norma Kell wakes up in the morning. There's also Keeper Yennen."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Keeper Yennen! We know him! I think, right? We know him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we know Keeper Yennen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, aye. That's all I can think of at the moment."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long has your husband been missing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "About six months."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: About six months.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was he doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's a merchant sailor, coming in and out, but he'd be back within the month usually. Some "trips took longer, but six months seems extraordinarily long for him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did he go, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Last I know, he does a circle around the southern tip of Tal'Dorei and he usually hits Emon "by ship. Occasionally heads over to the-- where is it? The shama?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shambala?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe something like that. I don't really know for sure. It's a long ways away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth? I whisper to her. Keyleth, can you scry on people we don't know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I have a piece of one of their belongings. Yeah, that definitely helps, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hilda? Would you like us to check and see if we can potentially find him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can do that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if you have something of his that we can look at, we might be able to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, aye! Just a moment." And she goes and she goes rushing up the street real fast, this renewed excitement in her face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we feel about her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, if you were dead set on JB taking over the business--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'm not. JB, don't feel pressured if you don't want to do this. She's a fantastic baker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, she's a really good baker. But maybe JB can handle the books, and she can handle the baking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there is another option. Which is that we have a giant pile of histories and library and novels in our collected library, and we are searching for information about the thing underneath the castle, and we need readers. We need lots and lots of people to read lots and lots of books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm a good reader. I can--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that seems like a little more fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, yeah. I can also help with this if you want. I'm more than happy to do both. I have a "lot of free time now."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. You could run the bakery during the day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't while we're gone you could help Hilda. Hilda?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hilda.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hilda. You could just help out, but maybe leave her in charge? She seems like a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you could sit in the castle and read diaries and ancient tomes of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I notice Grog looking uncomfortable?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I definitely notice. I don't care.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cell phone ringing) Oh dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Timer's done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, does she notice you feeling uncomfortable?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Do you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, are you uncomfortable?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With this talk of reading? A little bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) But Grog, you can read some of those books a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's not get ahead of ourselves, all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, okay. I think this is a great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm watching where Hilda is running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a quick thought. If her husband's dead, are we just going to tell her that right now? Just you know, husband's dead. He's being eaten by fish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you didn't get a read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so Keyleth, if you like do read it and you see it's super bad, don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's too hazy. I can't see him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't seem right at all

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, but I think she should plan for her life if he's not coming back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Pike and I are in agreement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if he's alive and in peril, do we tell her that? We're going to lose our only employee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, then we go try to help him, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? We have to go help someone? We just met this person!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we do, Tary!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't done that in quite a while to be fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, he was in somewhere like shambalam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know what she was talking about, by the way?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Weirdly, the arrow hits and kills Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (death rattle) Not like this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do that! This is a long whisper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's telling her real stuff, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man, this is not what we normally get.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is a whole chunk of stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Backblaze!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, just a little insight, what we normally get on the whispers is, "From what you can tell, it seems totally normal." And then that's about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually really accurate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Briefly, back in the old days, they were experimenting with texting us whispers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As far as you can tell he thinks he's telling the truth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm glad we stopped trying to text each other whispers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, her mind is blown.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have a pencil! I got to write this shit down. Pencil!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Her eyes go white and it's just (scribbling). Yay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was so much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's drawing a weird alien creature.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Big head, big eyes, small body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three syllables. We're being invaded by dingbats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does a smiley emoji mean? I don't understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She speaks Arrival language now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Percy! I saw something!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You didn't. Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did! I think it was another plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex dies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to figure out how to-- is there a way to make sure we get every detail? I'm finding pen and paper; we're writing everything you can remember down. Is there a way to recall someone's memory in perfect detail, is there any sort of magic that can actually--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. This shit's happening!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Otherwise, I could just tell you what I sort of saw, but I heard a lot of "Backblaze!" in the background.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was the Backblaze dimension?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not siphons. They're storage units!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You saw the cloud? What did it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently not under the same anti-magic shell on the other side. Whereas this side steals magic, the other side emits it. As the arrow landed and clattered to the stonework maybe 20 feet below the orb, looking around, she saw a landscape of blackened, broken stone and ground. Distant mountainscapes of jagged crags, like teeth across the horizon. The sky itself was black and shadowed, like it was perpetually amidst a distant forest fire, and where you can see the grey in the sky you can see roiling thunder clouds with flashes of lightning. And roughly a mile or so from what you could tell from where this was you could see what appeared to be a large obsidian tower of twisted black stone that went up for what appeared to be a dozen or more stories.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't we know something about obsidian--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The same tower we saw in the Nine Hells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, different tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is way bigger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the tower in the Nine Hells was the biggest thing you've ever seen tower-wise. This is big, but imagine a 12-story obsidian tower that's pretty thin and tall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm glad I remembered that correctly because I was remembering it as a citadel and it's just a tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is spectacular! This is great! We have to let everybody know! Oh god, we have to let everybody know. And I grab her and we bolt out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sound like anything you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No? Yes? Maybe? I don't know! I'm not sure. This is a breakthrough. We have a breakthrough! We have a breakthrough! I am running to Cassandra, who I'm sure is asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, most everyone's-- you guys have all gone to bed at this point I imagine; you guys were down there pretty late.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well first I drag Keyleth off to the cozy little bathtubs that they have here in the castle and took the opportunity-- they're quite small, actually. And washed all of the caked-in, the last of the caked-in blood and everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because they say it, it's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a full Roman sauna underneath, but that's fine, whatever you need.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I took JB back and we built a fort in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you've gone to bed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'm asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look for a book on werewolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20, Natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's that night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against all odds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The trick is it requires human sacrifice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is a full moon tonight, isn't it? Or was it last night? When was the full moon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You surprise yourself, Grog, going "w-w-werewolves." There's a book that talks about the disease of lycanthropy and were-creatures and entities, and it's there before you and you find it's like your own little birthday party.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sending out the word. I'm telling everyone that we have new information.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At night?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm starting it now so that people who are not here can figure out their way here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you getting it over our earpieces?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not them. To the studying council, anybody who's been studying the object. I'm letting everybody know as quickly as possible. There's new information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, let me-- I think I-- hold on." She goes and rushes back to her room and she comes back with a small, looks like a river stone, but has what looks to be a small rune carved into it. She takes it and holds it and goes "Sorry to bother you, my dear, but apparently Percival has a breakthrough "in regards to the ziggurat and the orb. As soon as you can, please." Then takes it and puts it into a small pouch. "Hopefully, Allura received that and should be arriving soon. As to Eskil, I don't know "how to get in touch with him; he's probably well into his sleep and he gets cranky."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent! Good night. Go to sleep. Why are you awake? No! And I'm out the door. I run to Vex's house. We're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys just go to bed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess so. Yeah. But, wait. Actually, Percy? Off-subject, but, when I saw Keyleth, I mean, she was destroyed right? I mean, fucking destroyed. Arms everywhere, limbs broken, just terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We put her back together like we always do, but I can't get Scanlan out of my mind. It's so random, I know, but what if that happened to him and we're not with him? No one's there to cast Revivify.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His daughter's there, and maybe he is possibly smart enough to explain to her how that stone works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you scryed on him again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not successfully. Not since I briefly found him and then I lost him. But I always have people looking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I don't know why he's on my mind. Obviously, we have much bigger things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been too quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not good at quiet

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is wonderful, but I will admit I miss-- I don't know what I miss. I miss it, though. I feel like I'm tempting fate and I'm going to regret everything I say right now, one day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we are, who knows what this will lead to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we can shut it down for good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we're going to go find a small black tower somewhere filled with death and despair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if I'm going to be able to sleep tonight!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you find your rest for the evening, the morning comes. Bright, warm. The clouds that came in for the evening, it's still a cloudy sky and as you wake up the mist that usually takes up the bottom of the valley and the forest floor is beginning to burn off as the sun begins to peek through the clouds and show little bursts of blue above. You guys head back to the castle, where all of you are, everyone but Keyleth. We'll say Keyleth's still sleeping and Taryon's still sleeping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth had a bit of day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She comes and takes your hand as well, Percival, and pulls you in. "So, Cassandra told me that there was some sort of a--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, Vex had a brilliant idea. Recently, you came to a very interesting power.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, from the exalted weapon that I got from Saundor.

lines.text: "Oh, your Vestige. Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and it has the ability to shoot arrows that see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I recall you telling me this, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so I shot it into the orb. And I saw through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh." At which point you watch her whole demeanor change and she leans in, "What did you see?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An obsidian tower like twelve stories tall.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Kiki. Good morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, sorry. I had weird dreams.

lines.text: That you died?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very dark, very scary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Another plane?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think. I assume.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Shadowfell, yes. You know how you went to the Feywild, which is more of an overgrown "fey-based nature parallel to this world, yes? The Shadowfell is the dark shadow reflection of this "same place. It's a plane of negative energy and darkness. A tower, you said? I have to go research "this some more. This is good to know, but I get the sense that perhaps this ritual was not as "foiled as we had initially anticipated."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I may go do some research."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her get a little thousand-yard stare for a second, thinking. Her eyes are darting around a little bit and her brain is just running and running. "All right. Well, unfortunately, I "can't leave until tomorrow, I can only really transport myself once a day, but I'll immediately "make my way to Vasselheim. That would hopefully be able to clarify some of these questions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need company?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I can travel faster on my own."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: How is Kima?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? Interesting. One thing you do catch, though subtle, is as she has her hands folded on one side you do see a small gold band across one of her fingers.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Sorry, this is conflicting emotions in this moment right now. Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did it happen?! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We thought and discussed a lot about all the "dangers we'd faced over the years together, and with you and the reality of not knowing how long "either of us have on this planet. I figured at the very least, why not?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's brilliant. Brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's been a lot to do in Emon. It's looking "great, by the way. We've nearly completed. Thanks to the help of the Lyceum and many of the mages, "reconstruction has been rapid."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: True.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want me to send you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah. Through the tree?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to jog her memory.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: I think we're good.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima's not with her.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a little bit of sleep stuff still in your eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eye bogeys, for sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was just asking. Okay, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, Keyleth. And--"

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: (laughing) As she's trying to talk to you, she's like, (stutters). And you just push her through. She's like, "Whoa!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thud) And it closes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are you awake? Nothing. Never mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, shit! Well, what do we do now that we know? I guess we just research?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This changes everything. I'm changing the research focus in the library specifically to things on this subject so that we can more focus.

lines.text: I'll help you go read, too. And I start reading my book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Hilda. Did anybody go down to the bakery?

lines.text: She was going to come to the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but-- okay.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA

lines.text: Sam...

lines.text: Where is Tary? Did he leave a note?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter the room-- SAM (whispers) Hilda ate me.

lines.text: You can see the sheet is missing. Most of his personal belongings are gone. Doty is still there. And Doty appears to be shut down, nonfunctional.

lines.text: Doty? Doty! Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The eyes are cold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check the book!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doty's book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I go look at Doty's book!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's within his chest compartment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I helped build this thing. Can I figure out how to get the book to eject?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm searching around the room, looking for any sign of Tary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so cocked. That's a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appears to be a small glass bead, affixed with a piece of clay. And the bead has this pulsing blue light on it. And you notice it there, and it looks like it's the only thing with any sort of life on Doty's exterior.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that look like part of Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't. It looks like something that was pressed onto him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we take it off?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it magical?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does appear to be magical. It is giving some sort of consistent pulse of energy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe don't touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks fragile, whatever it is. The essence of the magic that you get from it, the nature of the effect, at least, is abjuration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Abjuration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I genuinely don't actually know what this word means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea what that word means, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen it in the Player's Handbook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, what is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I normally have some clue about a word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Abjuration is one of the schools of arcane magic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of school is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) It's the alteration and harnessing of raw arcane energy. Usually in some sort of-- there are a number of spells that fall into the category.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should we call everyone? Let's not call everyone. Who should we call?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's call everyone. Has anybody seen Tary?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's sleeping in, isn't he?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he at the bakery?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, go check the bakery. Will someone go check the bakery?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll check the bakery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I see any trace of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Castle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they're at Vex's house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you have some coffee and come down here, quickly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Coffee sounds amazing to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Focus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three coffees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three coffees coming right up. I'll be right over. I get three coffees and I head over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like there was no struggle whatsoever. It looks like somebody entered and picked the lock to the room from the inside. That's all you're able to make out. From the inside of the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, from the inside of the

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody that was in the castle did this? In

lines.text: Sam, why don't you just tell us where you are?

lines.text: Sure. Doty is brushing my teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you end up opening the thing? Can you see Doty's book?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get all of my tools. I have everything on me including the cloak, because I want to be able to absorb any magic that comes off of what looks like possibly a bomb? Just going to be careful. I'm going to very gently remove the book.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last written page spoke of, "An evening of curious bakery purveyors signed on to see to "the future of goods, and to create in the name of the great Taryon Darrington and associates. And as "a sudden slumber comes over me, I will find myself an evening's rest. Goodnight, Doty." And that was the final entry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm waiting for Keyleth. I'm putting the book back.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you arrive with three coffees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tag along.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I have two regular, one decaf no foam--

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Is Hilda there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hilda is not there, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't see anything here, Hilda's not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bakery looks normal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The bakery looks normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Locked and closed, untouched since you left it the evening before.

lines.text: Wait, you think Doty's been boobytrapped?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Look at that. That doesn't look normal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to a take a look at that and see if it looks like a trap, and I don't understand magic, but if it is similar to any trigger mechanisms that I've seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, come out of the room with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it does not appear to be a trap, necessarily. It looks like whatever it's meant to be triggered to do has already been triggered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Somebody boobytrapped Doty. Can you scry on Taryon? Scry on Taryon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what-- I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's missing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's missing. Somebody broke in and took him. I go around and start asking-- no, I'm going to stay right here. Will you scry on him? I need to find out what happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, last time I tried to scry on Scanlan, everyone gave me a lot of grief about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He left Doty here. There is no way this was not foul play.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think this thing is looking at us? This little bead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once everyone clears out of the room, I will try and remove it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who is all in the room? Is it the four of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, me and you, we went outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is just Vax and Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am going to try and remove it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think it's trapped or anything. You probably can do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see what happens. I'm going to use the cloak to pull it off so that I'm shielded from it if anything happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you grab it, and as you pull it off, it's fixed and as you pull it off, the bead shatters in your hand and the blue spark fizzles out and you watch Doty go, "Tary."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like the bead shut him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that the basis of this magic was a one-use Dispel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not in the room. You're scrying. Will you scry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Doty immediately starts going "Tary?" and lifts the bed. "Tary?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'd be better if I had something of Tary's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty leaves and charges through the room and (footsteps) into the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty? Doty, come here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Doty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty belonged to him. Scry with Doty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up, bud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty stops and looks. "Tary?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to Professor Xavier this shit and put my hands on Doty's little head. Come here, bend down. Down, Doty. Doty, down. Doty, kneel! Doty, take a knee. Doty, down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty? Will you kneel down, please? Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know what? It's fine. And I'm going to do the scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what is happening right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm getting my rogue character ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulls out a small box and begins making something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what she is making?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She probably bought those cream puffs and didn't even bake them herself!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was Ralph's cream puffs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil. Oh, okay. Just straight intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen Vex do this before. It is a fletching kit. She is in the process of making arrows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's making arrows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's making arrows in a casual passing-her-time way. And then the vision pulls you back (whoosh) and you're within yourself once more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) Bitch! Fucking bitch! God!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is he? Who has him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) People wonder why we have trust issues!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who, what--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouting) It's fucking Hilda! She's a vampire or a werewolf or a lich or something. I don't know. Don't quote me on any of this. She was just like, I don't want your vitals going down and why do people take everything away from us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slap her across the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you fucking calm down and tell me what you saw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you see Tary-town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw Tary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he in trouble? Is he in danger?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he looked unconscious, and it was Hilda, and she had ink-blue, sparkly skin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not sparkly, necessarily. Ink-blue skin, silver eyes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ink-blue skin and long silvery hair that was in a top long ponytail thing. Long green-- and she had burgundy armor. He was in a wooden room, somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it close by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her ears were pointed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In a hallway. Her ears were pointy. I know a lot of people have pointy ears, including myself, so I'm not judging anyone who has pointy ears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was she a drow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, Keyleth, who have not actually seen a drow elf in person, really, over an extended period of time to know much about their culture, but through this conversation, she does appear to be, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She sounds like those things you have said before. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The drow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The drow, yeah. Like us but blue skin, white hair. And she said she doesn't want him losing too much of his vitality, and that she was going to take him back to where he came from and that he was special.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) She was bringing him home?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she was bringing him home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To his piece of shit family?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To his piece of shit family!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to get him. We have to help him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But why is Tary special?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's very rich. I'm sure his family is just looking for him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he is daddy's boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. This seems like she was interested in something other than his money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well. It's irrelevant, though. We've got to go get him.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It just means we knock her unconscious as opposed to killing her when we get there. It will be fun. Let's do this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have any idea of the hallway and the room, of how far away it was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's you have no idea where.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this we can deal with. A roadside inn. We know were Tary comes from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could be literally anywhere within a hundred-mile radius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know which roads one would take to get there from Whitestone, conveniently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you know, the town of Deastok that he comes from, which is in Wildmount. There are no roads that go there from Whitestone because it is across the Shearing Channel to the other continent. Which means you have to either go by boat-- and even then, it's probably a few hundred miles away from Whitestone on that side of the continent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do a Locate Object.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, on his dangling earring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a hundred-foot range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was a thousand feet range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, a thousand-foot range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is still very, very close.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or very far, when jumping off a cliff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if he's still here?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was nowhere they could have gone. There is no window that exits, then the door was picked, and nobody saw anybody leave the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She bamfed out. She's got magic. She could be anywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am good at math, why? What sort of math?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, when was the last time we saw Tary?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: It wasn't necessary a bamf. It might have just been, in and out, get on a horse and head towards--

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was making arrows.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where is he? Did you find him? Anything? Nothing?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could you draw something for me again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try it. Give him the book. Give him some paper and a pencil.

lines.text: Do you know where Taryon went? Can you draw it? Shit, I thought he listened to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He does listen to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. The old Doty did.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck.
